pullrequest.title: similar fix to pull request #112, reorganizing atlas_description and irobot_hand_description install targets

content.raw: I am able to view the diff of changes in 3454c11. It seems like the rest was just merging. This might be cleaner if you repeated the changes from that last commit on a fresh branch from drcsim_2.0
